titleStmt.title: A discourse of local motion undertaking to demonstrate the laws of motion, and withall to prove that of the seven rules delivered by M. Des-Cartes on this subject, he hath mistaken six / by A.M.
titleStmt.author: A. M., 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.G. and are to be sold by Moses Pitt,
